players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I have proof."
You: "I'm not the mafioso. I'm innocent."
Diana: "Bob is lying. I think he's the mafioso because Charlie said so, and Bob denied it."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob
